readable.title: 3003691049_f4363c2d5c
readable.content: A dog corners a little girl next to a police cruiser . A girl playing with a dog near a police car . A large white dog , a girl , and a police car in a driveway and an SUV in a garage . A little girl is playing with a large , white poodle in the driveway next to a police car . The girl is playing with her dog in her driveway .
